skeleton

Class SkeletonSystemGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • skeleton.SkeletonSystemGeneration

  • public class SkeletonSystemGeneration
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a bone system in hierarchy structure
    Author:
    Jim Stanev

      • generateTreeSystem

        private void generateTreeSystem()
        Because of the skeleton extraction algorithm some chains my be orphans with respect to the whole bone system. To make a whole bone system I implemented the minimum spanning tree algorithm by Kruskal to generate a graph with the connections, which is used to generate the core bone system to which will be attaced the remaining points of the chain.

      • addToBoneSystem

        private void addToBoneSystem(math.geom3d.Point3D p,
